dependsOn.activity: CALLING copy DL to DL PL

properties.description: This pipe line we are developing to copy data from input path to bronze zone

text.value:
UPDATE ExportTableList_3
SET EXPORT_DATE = CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE),
    Export_Status = 'SUCCESS'
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';

UPDATE ExportTableList_3
SET EXPORT_DATE = CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE),
    Export_Status = 'Failed'
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';

INSERT INTO PIPELINE_LOG (PipelineName, ActivityName, TableName, FileName, FileType, Status)
VALUES (
    '@{pipeline().Pipeline}', 
    '@{activity('Copy Data1').activityType}', 
    '@{item().TableName}', 
    '@{item().FileName}', 
    '@{item().FileType}', 
    'SUCCESS'
);

message.value: 'Hi all file not found in given path'

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT LastWatermarkValue FROM ADF_Watermark WHERE TableName = 'EMP';

properties.description: To get only files ending with CSV

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM Sales
WHERE ModifiedDate >= '@{formatDateTime(trigger().startTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}'
  AND ModifiedDate <  '@{formatDateTime(trigger().endTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}'

@concat(
  'SELECT SaleID, ProductID, CustomerID, Quantity, Amount, ModifiedDate ',
  'FROM Sales WHERE ModifiedDate >= ''',
  formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.WindowStart, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
  ''' AND ModifiedDate < ''',
  formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.WindowEnd, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
  ''''
)
